1.content:
A cool twilight breeze blew down the narrow alley which was home to The Velvet Snail, the only club where both giants and little people were allowed to drink at the same time. Rock music blared out of the doors as taxis carrying tiny drinkers swerved hecticly around giant feet. The place was the biggest club in town for most, but a small bar to a few.

There was a reason why The Snail was unique: most people considered that alcohol and people over 900 feet tall was a stupid idea... The club did have a reputation for drunken accidents and the odds of never being seen again while small were still too high for most. Only the most reckless or drunk normals ventured there.

The doors open. The smell of beer and a blast of sound welcome you to a night to remember!

Which patron shall we focus on first?
1.title: The Velvet Snail

choices: Look at someone else in the line
Meanwhile back at The Happy Pig...
11.content:
George sat in the beer garden of The Happy Pig chatting to some people he didn't actually know. It was a nice enough place and he was in a good mood even if the band was terrible.

"On your own then?" enquired the wizened sop opposite and George grinned.

"Heh, no! Just waiting for Anna, my girlfriend; she should be here any minute!"


********************************************************************************

Anna sat forward in the taxi as it raced towards The Velvet Snail. She straightened her tartan kilt and brushed her long red hair out of her eyes and hiccuped. She was a little drunk already. Completing her outfit were a black halterneck top and knee high black boots.

The driver glanced over his shoulder, "Are you sure you want to go here? That place is dangerous!"

As if to emphasize the point he suddenly swerved the cab left to avoid a blocky high heel wider than the car which slammed down ahead of them making the car tremble. Expertly regaining control he breathed heavily. "See?" he half shouted, "the giants here have been drinking. They don't look where they're going so good! And you want to go inside, a nice girl like you?"

"Yes... I've been there before. It's fun!"

The driver continued for a minute in silence and then said, "I know some good places... If you wanted to.."

"NO... thankyou! Just get me there will you?"

"We're there."

The cab pulled in close to the cliff like facade of The Velvet snail and Anna got out and joined the short queue which hugged the wall to avoid giant feet heading to the thousand and something foot high giants' doors to the right of the normal entrance. Just a hundred feet away a huge foot clad in a gladiator sandal towered upward to a long pale leg. There was no-one she knew in the line, so her gaze turned and followed the leg up and up... a long strong calf .... and up.... the start of a thigh and then the hem of a short white skirt....

The queue moved, shaking her out of her reverie. It was time to pay. Shaking a little, she fumbled for her purse and paid the doorman. She stepped inside...
11.title: Anna

111.content:
Anna automatically checked her handbag for the miniature megaphone which all citizens of New Olympus carried for communication with giants and stepped through the doors. A wave of sound hit her as she surveyed the vast chamber of The Snail. The ceiling was shrouded in darkness over a thousand feet above and the room stretched for kilometers in every direction. Dimly lit and smoky from giant cigarettes the room made her head spin. Giant feet moved and danced to her left in front of the base of a vast bar striped with high speed lifts so that normal people could get served by the giant bar staff. A pair of big flat boots and a pair of bare feet with an anklet; a giant and giantess dancing to the punk pop the DJ was playing. To her right was the seating area. Immediately next to her was the taxi rank providing free transport for them across the huge floorspace.

Anna smiled and climbed into a taxi heading for...
111.title: Go in!

1111.content:
Anna strapped herself in and the taxi accelerated rapidly as the driver floored the pedal. It was exhilarating. The cabbies of New Olympus were some of the best drivers in the world and the car cruised at well over a hundred miles per hour across the empty edge of the giant dancefloor, the five hundred foot cliff face of the bar looming closer.

Soon he slowed and turned right driving parallel to it towards the first of the high speed lifts which traced neon lines up the towering ediface. As they approached they drove in front of a huge pair of feet clad in silver strappy sandals. A crowd of people gathered around the lift, overshadowed by the giantess' toes. Further on ahead was another lift near the pair of black strappy gladiator sandals she'd passed on her way in. The owner had effortlessly passed the speeding cab and beaten her to the bar.

"This stop or the next," asked the driver.
1111.title: Bar Crawling

11112.content:
As the taxi approached the huge gladiator sandals, Anna realised that they were further away than she had thought. They were just very big even for a giantess. She stared up at pale muscular calves high above her up to powerful but feminine thighs and the white skirt.... and up.... and up... the underside of breasts covered by black fabric and high above that nearly a kilometer up the underside of a chin framed by long jet black hair...

Finchenza stood at the bar waiting for her drink. She was a striking woman, standing six feet tall with piercing green eyes and a well defined body betraying time in the gym. She had been a regular in The Velvet Snail for years and loved the place, the music, the hordes of tiny people who made it all more interesting than any other pub or club... She looked down at her feet. She loved how small and powerless the little people looked near them. She saw one of the little taxis, pull up near her left foot near the crowd waiting for the lift. A bug sized redhead got out and walked a little way towards her. She wondered what they were thinking. Playfully she raised her foot and waved it at the new arrival.

Anna stared up at the giantess, almost hypnotised, when suddenly a vast foot lifted and flew towards them sending people turning to run and screaming. A huge gust of wind sent her tumbling. She stared up helplessly at what seemed to be the tan coloured underside of a building over sixteen metres across moving toward her. She saw writing on the sole and a number nine, then just as fast it pulled back and tilted down, massive toes bigger than her whole body wiggling at her. A booming voice called down and she realised the giantess was looking down at her."Hello there, little one. I'm Finchenza. Nice to meet you!"

Other people were climbing to their feet and she heard laughter and someone crying but she just stood transfixed, staring up into the sky. Her eyes widened again.

Finchenza wasn't wearing underwear...
11112.title: At Finchenza's Feet

111121.content:
Anna stared up... and up at a massive pair of pink lips in a small forest of dark hair illuminated by the diffuse light which filtered through the white fabric of Finchenza's skirt. Behind she saw the curve of well toned pale hills; a perfect peach, bigger than Anna's entire home. Finchenza simply stood. She must know that the hundreds of normal people in the Snail could see this... Anna's heart pounded in her chest, still frightened by her experience under the giant sandal, excited and her mind rushing as she wondered who this giantess truly was. The sandal... She was still far too close to that!

She became aware of her immediate surroundings again. She lay between Finchenza's feet, close to a pale white foot which towered above her wrapped by leather straps which looked too strong for her to bend but which creaked at the merest flex of the muscles in the giant foot. The air smelt of Finchenza's sweat and a short distance away at the lift, some people were yelling at her to get to safety.

Anna felt a surge of annoyance. She wasn't feeble; she could look after herself. She hated being patronised. She jumped as the giant heel lifted with a groan of tortured leather and rose high into the air. ...

*bip-de-boopboop-bip-diddi-bip*

Unbelievable! Her phone was ringing!
111121.title: Big Sky

choices: Meanwhile, at The (not so) Happy Pig...
1111211.content:
"You ringing her then?" enquired the ancient geezer opposite George through his false gnashers as the band played Fuck On Fire by The Dukes of Hazard for the third time. Dreary forty-somethings swivelled ineptly and cheered as George clenched his teeth.

"No; I'm practicing morse code on a miniature xylophone!"

"Oh good-oh. I used to play morse xylophone back in North Africa, during the war. Thousands of us there was.... Rommel his self turned to jelly in...."

Mercifully Anna picked up the phone at this point. He pictured her as she'd been when she went off earlier that evening in the short tartan skirt he loved and made up. Just going out for a few drinks with a friend... He fought back paranoia.

"What?!" Muffled music blared out of the phone.

"Hello..."

"What?"

"HELLO! Where are you?"

Anna flinched with annoyance. "I'm getting a drink! Does it matter?"

George paused in disbelief. "Yes it matters! You were supposed to be here an hour ago! Where are you?"

"I said I might meet you.

George got up and walked over to a corner of the beer garden. "You didn't! You said you'd meet me at The Happy Pig at ten! Where are you? I've been waiting an hour now!"

"I'm in The Velvet Snail. You can join me if you want... I'm not going to The Crappy Pig. I want to go somewhere I like for once!"

George's head reeled feeling suddenly afraid for Anna. The Snail was the giant bar. He'd heard stories. Bad stories! "The 'Snail! Why? You know how I feel about The Snail! It's dangerous! You could get stepped on and crushed to death or kidnapped by some drunk giant and... and..."

Anna rolled her eyes in annoyance. It wasn't bad enough that those strangers here were treating her like a child, now George was too! "I'm okay George. Now stop bothering me!"

Where are you to be okay in there?" George nearly shouted into the phone. The thought of anything happening to Anna made him feel sick.

Suddenly Finchenza swivelled her toes round and Anna found herself staring up again at the huge sole of her sandal. "I'm underneath a fifty foot long gladiator sandal, if you must know! It's a size nine and it's cozy here. I like it! She knows me and I'm safe! So leave me alone!" Anna was scared but her excitement about Finchenza and annoyance at George for ruining the moment overrode that. George shrieked in horror at the other end of the phone and she hung up and switched the phone off as the giantess bobbed her foot overhead to the music. Anna wasn't scared. The giantess knew she was here and wouldn't step on her. The sole lowered almost on to her and then rose and moved away making the ground shake as it landed off to her left. She was a little disappointed, but now she had to meet this woman!

Anna got to her feet and ran to the lift.
1111211.title: The Happy Couple

1113.content:
Anna sashayed over to the nearest cab in what she had decided was a sexy yet enigmatic way and collapsed onto the back seat.

"Dancefloor," she said, waving her taxi pass in the air and the cab accelerated causing her to fall back into the cushioned seat. These cabs drove fast. It had been suggested when New Olympus was established that high speed train lines be built as transport around the giant areas, but it had been pointed out that the tracks would just get destroyed by giants treading on them, so taxis it was. The New Olympus taxi corp. were the elite of global taxi drivers with a rigorous examination requirement, great pay and driving the fastest and best cars. The rate of fatal accidents was still bad, but the opportunity to drive fast cars in such a unique environment attracted thousands of eager applicants from around the globe. This one sounded French.

Anna's phone rang making her frown. "Hey, she said, "Can we take a shortcut? You know, straight across the giant floor?" She was feeling good and wanted to check out the dancers up close.

"Non! I regret that I cannot endanger a passengers life in such a reckless manner! I am a professional!"

Anna shoved a fiver in his direction. "Scared?"

The money disappeared. "'El no! I learnt to drive in Paris!"

The car swerved left and revved alarmingly as they headed towards the huge dancing feet. As they got closer, Anna peered out of the window, craning her neck to see them. He was over a thousand feet tall and well built with shoulder length light brown hair, wearing a black music t-shirt, denim cut-off shorts and big black boots. She was 920 feet tall with blonde hair and a slim build, wearing a red crop top and matching very short skirt and was dancing barefoot, having kicked her shoes off. From down here Anna could see her underwear. As they got closer the cab began to vibrate with their footfalls.

The driver veered right aiming to miss them by about a hundred metres. "Are you ready, my fine crazy mad drunk girl? This could get..."

The girl reacted to a shift in the music and a bare sole over forty metres long plunged toward them and crashed to the ground just outside the right windows as the driver frantically swerved left setting the tires screaming and throwing Anna against her belt. The car actually jumped slightly into the air.

"Meeeeerrrrrrrddddeeeeee!" screamed the driver and Anna screamed inspite of herself. Outside the giant girl's left foot swung overhead and plummeted down ahead of them. The driver momentarily panicked. He had to swerve, but which way?
1113.title: Vroooooooooooooooommm!

11131.content:
The driver swerved left and everything went into slow-motion. Anna heard her phone ringing again as she was flung right. Overhead the giantess moved her leg in time to the music swaying it left so that it followed the car. It got dark and Anna could see the shadowed sole stretching away instead of the sky. There was a deafening boom and then the scream of tortured metal and people as the windows shattered spraying glass over her and then the ceiling collapsed onto her, seats buckled and there was an instant of agony as her bones broke and she was crushed into the wreck as the foot pressed down onto the floor

************************************************

In the garden of The Happy Pig George put his phone away and sipped at his pint.

"Anything wrong," enquired the old man.

"No," he said, smiling, "she'll be here any minute..."

**************************************************

Samantha danced to the music and flirted with the guy who was trying to flirt with her.

She felt something crunch under her left foot. She stopped and raised her foot to inspect her sole. There was something like a piece of foil stuck to the ball of her foot.

The big guy stopped and looked quizzically at her, "What's up?"

She frowned. "I think I stepped on a taxi..."

He looked a bit lost. "What were they doing driving here?"

She felt sorry for the little people inside and there was an awkward silence for a few seconds. Her favourite song came on and she smiled. These things happened. She scraped her sole against her toe dislodging the wreck and began to dance again.
11131.title: Dance Step

choices: She shuts the door and waits
11133.content:
He hit the brakes and the cab skidded wildly, tires screeching, as the driver fought for control. The deadly foot dipped terrifyingly close plunging them into darkness then flew off to the left as they span round in circles and pounded down bouncing the car and sending Anna's stomach into her mouth. It was just what they needed to break the skid! The driver sagged over the wheel, breathing heavily and Anna sighed with relief. For a moment there she'd thought it was all over... BOOM! The giant girl's right foot slammed down less than twenty feet ahead shaking the car again. They weren't out of danger yet!

The driver swore again and tried to drive but the engine wheezed and stalled. He tried again and again... Anna began to panic. She could see and hear the giant feet. She was dancing right over them! Couldn't she see them?

"C'mon! Drive!"

"What the hell do you think I'm trying to do?" The engine whined again. "I'll have it in a minute!" He sounded shaken.

The car jumped again as a heel the size of a house pounded down right next to them blocking the light. "We don't have a minute!" Anna screamed. "I'm getting out." She started to fumble with the door.

"What? No! Are you crazy? If you go out there I'm not chasing after you; I'm going as soon as I get this damn car going again!"

The door swung open, and Anna stared out at the giant heel as it raised into the sky again.
11133.title: Swerve Into Danger!

111331.content:
Anna fell out of the car door and rolled onto her feet. THOOM! The giant foot slammed down just to one side of them shaking the ground and knocking Anna back down. The driver desperately tried the ignition but it was gone. He swore and got out of the car. He was clearly terrified. Overhead, the giantess danced, oblivious to the tiny people under her feet. As the driver picked himself up after the latest tremor, the ball of a huge foot slammed down from the sky onto his cab and with a blast of sound it was gone, the metal pressed flat under the ball of the giantess's foot. He was bowled over by the impact, crashing into Anna, who stared as the vast sole rose into the air, the flattened car stuck to her foot like a piece of foil. It peeled off and fell towards them...

"MOVE!" she screamed and they rolled desperately, just avoiding the mass of crushed metal as it crashed to earth.

He was laughing. They both were. Toes bigger than both of them sailed overhead and slammed down, halting the laughter.

"We have to run!" yelled Anna.

"Where?!"
111331.title: Playing Footsie

1113311.content:
Samantha danced. She danced with the man she liked with her restrictive shoes tossed aside and she lost herself in the music. She didn't know what it was, nor did she care. The moment was everything and her bare feet pounded onto the wooden floor. She felt something crunch under her right foot but it didn't hurt her so she thought nothing of it... Her feet rose and fell slamming down onto the hard floor...

At the edge of the dancefloor a slim giantess with short hair saw what was happening and lit her cigarette. The man next to her was oblivious.

Anna opened her mouth to scream and no sound came out. She was exhausted and suddenly this wasn't fun anymore. A toe bigger than she was kicked her, sending her flying. The taxi driver had taken off. The taxi was scrap. It was all going wrong. The foot lifted and Anna saw the whorls on the surface of the skin lit by the ground lights fitted around. She gasped and rolled and Samantha trod on her, the tiny girl pressing under the arch of her foot. Anna felt her whole body compress in agony and then the giantess's foot lifted taking Anna with it. The tiny girl peeled off and fell smashing into the floor to see her driver disappear with a scream under a heel the size of a house. It lifted and Anna tried to turn away but couldn't move. The foot covered her again.... and then sailed overhead, missing
her.

Samantha laughed as she danced giving herself over to the moment. Something small like a bug squashed under her heel. She barely noticed.

Boop de de de boop do beep do boop do! Her phone was ringing! George! Not now! She ran as hard and as fast as she could. THOOM! She was knocked off her feet by the giant foot and her bag spilled it's contents including the phone. A voice called out, reedy through the electronic fog, "Anna? Anna! It's George..."

A boot crashed down next to her and then lifted off.

"Where are you? I've been waiting! Don't do this! Where are you?"

A shadow covered Anna as she gasped "The Velvet Sn..."
1113311.title: Lost in music

choices: Hell Lord in G Major by Masters of Shit
11133111.content:
Samantha's foot moved back and slammed down and Anna found herself staring up at the underside of one of her toes. The impact knocked the breath out of her and the phone crackled nearby. She couldn't tell what it was saying. She was too hurt to get up. Her life or death depended on the giantess dancing on her as though she was nothing.

The music stopped. Sound squawked out of her phone as the giant foot settled less than a metre from her. She stared up at the wall of hard flesh, and then up the long leg....

Samantha sighed. It was a good night. The guy she was dancing with smiled at her. Life was good. What now; dance or get a drink?

Anna sobbed. She remembered her driver and the terrible sound as he died. She began to crawl but she couldn't tell where she was going and knew she was at the mercy of the giant woman above her.

The DJ put on the next track. It was:
11133111.title: Dance of Death

111331112.content:
GRWANNNNNNNGGGGGG!

"Oh no," sighed Samantha, as the guy looked at her expectantly. "I like metal, I really do, but this is.... " She shifted her foot covering Anna under her arch. He gestured.

"....total shit. Look, if you'll stay with me and talk instead of pretending to like this crap I'll buy you a drink. Deal?" She raised her foot, scratching her calf and stepped to one side of Anna smothering the remains of the taxi and it's poor driver again.

He smiled, (though he really liked The Masters) and agreed. The girl wasn't the best looking he'd ever seen but she wasn't bad and free drink? Sold! "Okay."

She walked away and he followed.

In the pub garden George was frantic. "ANNA!" he yelled into the phone. Anna stirred and saw the dirty sole of a size 12 boot falling towards her. George... "Sorry George..."

George suddenly felt a wave of urgency and yelled "ROLL LEFT!!!"

She heard it from her phone but it hurt so much to move...
111331112.title: This party blows, man

choices: Anna's not so lucky this time
Anna sees the shadow, and rolls again
1113311121.content:
Anna rolls to the left to escape the oncoming foot.

Uh-oh, the other foot is coming down.
1113311121.title: Anna rolls

1113311122.content:
Anna gave up and watched the sole fall onto her. It was too big to dodge. It filled the sky and became her whole world. Silly George... The tread of the massive boot hit her and it seemed to last longer than it should. It was so painful as her body collapsed, bones snapping and crunching and her insides sqeezing out. Then....

George heard a terrible sound and then...

The woman with the short hair shuddered with pleasure as she took a drag of her cigarette and watched the foot tread down..
1113311122.title: Nothing

choices: The gents. It's all been too exciting.
12.content:
Sam stepped into the vast club and stared about in wonder. He was new in town; from a town with no giants and this was the closest he'd ever been to them. He was in his twenties, with tousled brown hair and wore a Hilarious Rats t-shirt, jeans and Converse style shoes. The room was awe inspiring, bigger than any cathedral it stretched away in every direction. Music blared deafeningly to accompany the spectacle of a bar far away ahead and left like a six hundred foot cliff face and even more astonishingly a pair of god-like dancers, each over nine hundred feet tall. The girl was beautiful, with blonde hair and scant red clothes including a miniskirt which displayed her underwear for them all to see over endless legs and dancing bare feet the size of buildings.

"Oy, boss! You want a taxi or not?"

Sam spun round in a daze. Oh yes, taxis. You would need them to get about in a place this big.

"Er... yes..."

He got in.

"Okay, chief, where to?"
12.title: Sam (small)

choices: Get back in the cab and take his chances
121.content: "The bar," Sam replied. The grizzled Taxi driver acknowledged pulling off to the elevator at the bottom of the bar. The driver showed his remarkable skill and prowess at the wheel as he zipped and zoomed in and out of the feet that belonged to the dancing gods. Before long they arrived at the elevator. Sam paid the driver and stepped out of the cab but before he made it too far he began to think of the girl again. He really did want to meet her, but what should he do?
121.title: The bar

choices: Continue to see what he gets up to at the bar
1212.content: Walking up to the elevator Sam pressed the button, calling the elevator from tits place at the top floor of the bar down to his ground level. As he waited he found his mind continuing to wander back to that girl. As his thoughts became muddled he began to loose awareness only capable of thinking about her. A ding singling the arrival of his transport snapped him back to reality. As he stepped inside he wondered what would become of his night.
1212.title: Continue to the bar.

122.content:
"See that big blonde giantess in the red? Follow those legs!"

The cab did not roar into life and charge into excitement.

"What?" asked Sam.

"New in town are you?" enquired the cabbie in a way that sent Sam's inner bullshit warning system ringing.

"Arr, yes, I be just a simple country boy, what has never seen a tall girl in the flesh and would like to go and get to know that fine example over there over a drink and some munchies. Now mush!"

"Oh dear oh dear oh dear. Dear me no. You don't want one of those ...."

"Excuse me. I may be just a country lad, but isn't it customary for you to be driving while you enlighten me with your years of honest down to earth wisdom?"

"grumble mumble grumble bah smartarse bah harumph" The car started.

"As I was saying, you don't want some huge great fancy giantess. No! A lad like you? What you want if you don't mind me saying..."

"...which I might not, not that it would stop you..."

"...is a nice petite normal girl with dark hair. A nice honest girl and a mug of Horlicks in front of an electric fire. Why, you wouldn't believe some of the stories I've heard about giant girls. I get all sorts in here. Just last week there was this..."

"So are we actually going to the girl I asked you to drive me to then?"

The cabbie appeared to think, his broad sweaty salt of the earth face creased in concentration.
122.title: The Wisdom of the Cabbie

choices: Sam wants to go over by Hailey on the dance floor
124.content:
"The seats." Sam replied. The taxi driver nodded and floored it, zipping along towards the seats.

Sam looked out the window and watched the giants and giantesses dancing out on the dance floor. Their huge feet pounded against the ground and he saw many of the women were dancing around barefoot, their huge feet slapping against the dance floor.

They were close to the seats now when suddenly BOOM, a gigantic silver stiletto sandal heel crashed down right in front of them. They could the massive tan foot of the giantess as well and her skin was perfect. The cabbie hit the breaks and car screeched to a halt.

"Shit!" The cabbie yelled. Sam looked out the window and saw the absolutely massive giantess take a seat and cross her legs. She was a gorgeous blonde with blue eyes and richly tan skin who was over 1000 feet tall with those heels on. She had model like figure and Sam stared intently at her, ignoring the swearing of the taxi driver. She wore a stunning short light blue dress that nicely rested on her breasts exposing just enough and very thin straps that which over each shoulder. She had toned tan legs and looked like a model. She pulled her heel off on her foot of the leg that was elevated which gave Sam a view of the massive reddened sole of the giantesses which looked slightly sweaty before crossing her legs the opposite way and pulling that heel off slamming her barefeet down. Sam watched her wiggle her massive toes and her toenails were painted white on her massive toes. The cabbie started driving once again but Sam's eyes were fixed on the massive giantess as she stood up and walked back out to the dance floor.

Hailey had come to the velvet snail with a few of her friends. She was a model and had recently finished a shoot in New Olympus and was celebrating. She was tall, standing at 5'11 which meant she was around 975 feet tall to people like Sam and with her heels on she was over 1000 feet tall. She had beautiful blonde hair and blue eyes and richly tan skin. Her hands were perfectly manicured and her nails on both her fingers and toes were painted white which went well with her richly tan skin. She had been dancing the night away with her friends but her feet had started to hurt for dancing in her stiletto sandals. She could use a good foot massage she thought. All of her friends had kicked off their heels and wedges, leaving them at their table so Hailey decided to do the same. As Hailey walked across the dance floor to her seat, eyes were drawn to her gorgeous figure as she cut though. Sitting down on the seat at their she crossed her legs and removed her heels. Her feet were big, a size 10.5 US women's but it didn't bother her the slightest. She slammed her warm feet onto the cool floor of the club, unaware of the tiny taxi, inches (her scale) from her massive feet and wiggled her toes. Much better she thought as she stood up and walked back across the dance floor to her friends. Hailey smiled as her friend handed her a drink and Hailey at once began to dance and laugh and smile.

Sam had followed the massive giantess in light blue dress who was now barefoot with his eyes back out onto the dance floor were he could see her dancing with a group of girls. He had been given a nice view of her ass as she walked away and looked perfect, nice and firm and the dress sure helped. He watched the massive tan feet slam down as the girl laughed and danced to the music.

"We're here." The cabbie yelled and Sam looked at him.
124.title: The seats

Many of the smaller patrons watched as the giant girls danced, their huge feet, endless legs and the rest towering up into the dark, with fear, lust or envy.

Emma was small and looked with envy at the big dancefloor, wanting to join in, but it was against the rules.

Susan sat at the tables, the same size as the dancers but with no interest in joining them. She was cringing at the awful music.

Tim was small and staring with unbridled lust. It was his first time here and he'd never realised how sexy a giant woman could be. He'd just feared them, but his attitude had just changed.
1241.title: Grindhouse

choices: Tim manges to get out of the way of Hailey
Tim can't get out of the way in time, Hailey steps on him
12413.content:
Tim timidly began to approach the edge of the dance floor as he watched the huge women dance. He was particularly drawn to the girl in the light blue dress who was currently grinding her ass against another girl and smiling while she held a drink in her hand. Tim saw several giant man standing around the group trying to dance their way into the group but the girls were careful to not allow any openings. They were having too much fun on their own.

Tim immediately called for a cab. The cab arrived and Tim hopped in the back.

"Where to?" The cab driver said.

"30." Sam said, "and don't worry what I'm going to do." He watched the massive tan feet of the giantess pound the ground as she danced.

"Still no." The cabbie replied watching as the giantess stomped around as she danced.

"Well I'm not paying you then. You refused to take to me to my destination." Sam said opening the door.

"What?! You can't do that!" The cabbie said.

"Watch me." Sam replied as he began to exit the cab.

"Fine. I'll take you. Just don't get squashed Romeo." The cabbie replied.

Sam smiled as he got back in.

"So about that 30." The cabbie said.

"You refused that offer so it's no longer an option." Sam said smirking.

The cabbie huffed. "Alright, I'll take you."

Sam watched as the cab began to enter the dance floor, his eyes locked on the massive tan titan dancing away.

The cab swerved left and right as the cabbie had to avoid the feet of the Giants and giantesses. Barefeet, heels, pumps, wedges, sandals, boots, flip flops, sneakers all crashed down around them. Sam looked out the window often to follow the huge legs up to the Titans dancing above. The cab was constantly shaking from the dancing feet of the giant people.

Sam saw they were getting closer to the giantess from the seats. He watched as she was currently dancing with a few other girls, probably her friends, their massive barefeet slamming down on to the dance floor as they danced and laughed.

As they drove, a giantess who was dancing noticed the tiny cab as she had just so happened to look down at it. She wondered why it was on the dance floor but grinned mischievously down at it. She was currently barefoot and deciding on if she would toy with the tiny cab, dancing was getting a little boring anyhow. She watched as it zipped along swerving around another girls barefoot.
1242.title: Sam wants to go over by Hailey on the dance floor

13.content:
Alana stood in the doorway of The Velvet Snail and with a guilty start looked down at her feet to see where the nearest little ones were. There was a miniature taxi rank about a foot from her left shoe. A few centimeter tall people seemed to be staring at her cork soled wedge sandal. Looking down while you walked was a necessary pain in New Olympus if you didn't want to become an accidental murderer. It was why most normal sized people lived in their own towns and those that did live here went to other bigger nightspots. She looked at a tiny person smaller than one of her toes and shuddered as she imagined scraping them off her shoe. Well, no harm done, but she'd have to be careful in here, particularly if she carried on drinking as she had.

Satisfied that she hadn't killed anyone she looked up and surveyed the room. She'd found this place last week and had been looking forward to coming back. The Snail was a tiny place which had a cosier atmosphere than most pubs she frequented. A man and woman danced on the small wooden dancefloor in front of the tiny square set aside for tinies to dance on. To the left was a bar and to the right, a seating area in an alcove off the main room. The music (some sort of pop rock) was pretty quiet to protect the delicate eardrums of the little patrons, but that made it easier to socialise.

The place was about as busy as it ever was. About a dozen normal people; the dancers, a group of girls, a couple and a few others. (Not many men, she noticed.) There was one woman she remembered from last week; possibly even taller than her, with long jet black hair and piercing green eyes wearing a white skirt, black halterneck top and flat gladiator sandals which twined around her calves. She'd missed talking to her properly last time and would have to make amends. She was at the bar. And of course there were the dozens of tiny people scurrying, dancing and driving about which made this place's reputation.

While Alana surveyed the bar, some of the other drinkers surveyed her; she was tall, five foot ten with long wavy red hair framing an attractive oval face and blue eyes. Her figure hugging black dress highlighted rather than concealed a trim athletic body leading down to feminine but, frankly, big feet - size nines- enclosed in black leather strappy sandals with cork wedge soles. The guy dancing actually stopped briefly and blatantly checked her out, to the annoyance of his dance partner.

Alana was oblivious though and headed for...
13.title: Alana (giantess)

133.content:
Finchenza was paying for her Bacardi and Coke and chatting to Beth the barmaid, her head nodding in time to "Mr. Ironic" by Print Beating. Her gaze dropped to the miniature bar near her elbow and the little people picking themselves up after dodging the glass as Beth slammed it down. She'd been a regular at The Snail for years and was well used to the tiny people. They were quite good fun when you got to know them and she had always been careful not to squash any. (Actually she had stepped on a few over the years when she was very drunk but hadn't noticed!)

Most of the little people were just drinking and talking amongst themselves, while as always a few newcomers stared up in awe at her and a few others were staring up at her breasts. She always found that sort of funny. She paid for her drink. Beth chatted away. She was leaving to move to a new town and job and this was her last night.

"Be sad to see you go," Finchenza said and then raised her glass, "Good luck though. What are you drink.... Are you drinking?"

"Hell yes. I'm gone after today, so who cares? Are you b..."

"What are you drinking?"

"Vodka and coke, thanks!"

Finchenza forked out the cash. What now?

14.content:
Gordon looked at The Velvet Snail. It was a small place with relatively quiet music audible from the pavement. Sounded like Funk Croissant by Pear Cafe. Not bad. Not good. Sort of average really. It was okay; he wasn't here for the music anyway. As long as they didn't play Fuck On Fire by The Dukes of Hazard he'd be fine. No, Gordon was here to experience little people!

He was born and raised in Hodborough, a small town in the big country with no little people. All his life he'd

a) been truly desperately bored and wanted to leave and

b) heard stories of the tiny people they shared the planet with. Perfect little replicas of normal people a centimeter tall. In his childhood he'd imagined they lived in the dark corners of his house and behind the skirting boards. He'd put up with complaints from his friends when his days out searching for them ended in disappointment.

Finally, he'd managed to escape his boring home town and given a choice of jobs he'd picked the one in New Olympus so that he could finally meet the people who had eluded him. So far he'd been amazed by the sight of the bug sized people and their tiny cars scooting around on the floor and the toy-like sections of town but disappointed too. Nobody seemed to care. There had been no interaction between sizes at all and it was all more than a little dispiriting. After a day out exploring, he'd gone out drinking, and that's when he'd heard about The Velvet Snail. It was perfect! The crowd he'd been talking to had turned up their collective noses and headed off to some huge dance place across town, but Gordon would not be budged. There was only one place he wanted to be!

On the ground, a group of tiny girls watched the arrival of the giant. He was tall; six foot two to him, but over a thousand feet tall to them, with shoulder length dark wavy hair, wearing a bright yellow Calculator Crab t-shirt, cut off denim shorts and leather sandals. The ground trembled as he went in.
14.title: Gordon Arrives!

142.content:
The tiny girls watched the giant man enter in awe.

"Damn he's huge." Michelle, a short (5'2), cute redhead said.

"Yeah he is. That's way to much man for me though." Kristy, who was a 5'9 brunette said.

"Who cares," giggled Sara, a 5'6 blonde who was bubbly and was the stereotypical dumb blonde along with big tits and a nice ass. "We're here for regular guys."

"You know how big that cock of his is?" said Amy, a 5'6 brunette who was on the heavier side of the scale and wasn't exactly a looker but she had a built in sex drive.

"Do you ever think about anything?" said Kelly, rolling her eyes. She was a 5'7 blonde who had toned legs and an athletic build and a bit of a more serious demeanor.

(All the girls are wearing heels so they are several inches taller than their given heights.)

"Chill out Kells. I'm just saying that cock of his is probably like a tower compared to us.

"Whatever."

The girls entered the club and took a cab over to the seats.

Upon exiting the cab and while talking amongst themselves a group of 3 men approached them.

"Well hello there ladies." Said the first guy, a tall, thin, blonde haired man. "Names Brett and these are my friends Tom and Jax." Tim had brown hair and was fairly muscular and Jax was a blonde hair man who was well built and had a friendly smile.

All 3 guys had their eyes on Sara, who was wearing a revealing dress and killer heels. They had surrounded her and we're all talking at once to the giggly blonde.

"Great. Another night of every man in the room drooling over blondie." Kristy muttered.

"I don't understand how she doesn't realize why men are so nice to her." Michelle added.

"Who cares. Who wants drinks? I'll buy the first round since little miss sunshine is gonna be getting free drinks all night. Again." Kelly said.

As Kelly took the girls drink orders, she was about to head out when Sara and the 3 men walked over.

"Guess what?" Sara began, "These great guys have 2 more friends on the way here. Right now!"

"Yeah we were just telling your friend Sara here, you know there's 5 of us, 5 of you," Jax said.

"We'd love to hang with you!" Amy blurt out surprising everyone.

"Awesome! We were gonna order drinks? What are you girls all drinking?" Tim said smiling.

The girls face their drink orders and the men and Sara departed for the bar.

"It's kind of a bad idea to stay right here. We're right in front of a both for those giant people." Kelly said.

"You worry to much Kelly, besides, I don't see any giants coming this way." Amy said.

"Yeah chill out Kells, we're all getting laid tonight!" Michelle laughed.

Kelly had to laugh as well and the girls talked as they waited for Sara and their new friends to return.

It was a dark and humid night. There were no stormclouds around.

Mika Stone stepped out of the cab and tipped the driver with insults as she adjusted her fedora. It was too hot for the trenchcoat, but she was a dick and had an image to maintain.

Yes, Mika Stone was a dick. A private dick. "You are the son of a motherfucker!" The muffled sounds of the Pixies floated on the night air as the striking private eye surveyed the scene.

The Velvet Snail had a rep and that made it Mika's kind of dive, but people were missing and the parents of one of those poor shlubs had hired Mika Stone and from where Mika Stone was standing that development meant trouble like a taxi cab driven by the bastard lovechild of the angry guy from Mad Max 2 and a vole on crack, and as Mika turned and gave the finger to the departing cabbie she knew that was a storm she'd already wethered.

This town was dangerous. Hell, this town was danger, but Mika Stone ate danger for a light mid-morning snack between extreme dangers. The sidewalk was packed with people. People her height swarming to the Snail like every Friday, Saturday, Sunday, Monday, Tuesday and Thursday.*

Relax. Mika used her senses. First smell, that most overlooked of senses.

Yuk. Sod it, sight. The bar towered like a mountain and as she stood there a giant couple approached the giant entrance, people running to get clear as huge boots and shoes shook the ground.

Michael had just arrived at the Velvet Snail. He quickly headed inside and hailed a cab. He was on his way to meet up with his friends who had came to the club a little earlier. Instructing the driver where to go, he was soon off.

1542.content:
Michael and his friends Tom and Peter were meeting up with some girls that Tom had met a few days back. When Michael had arrived the three girls had just shown up. The 3 friends greeted the three girls whose names were Daisy, Melissa and Elizabeth. The 6 immediately hit it off and decided they should dance.

"Come on, let's dance on the big dance floor."

"Daisy are you crazy?! Dance on the dance floor with the giants?! We'll get crushed!" Melissa said.

"Not of we just stay over in this area. Look. There's no Giants over here." Peter said smiling.

"Yeah! Plus the tiny dance floor is like, way over there." Daisy said.

"I don't see why not. Come on let's dance!" Michael said as the group of friends all moved out on to the giant dance floor.

Caylie was a giant, well, to the tinies at the Velvet snail she was at by some measure even in New Olympus.
Standing 5'10 to her fellow giants, she was a massive 962.5 feet tall to the tinies scurrying around at her feet. Caylie was coming to the Velvet Snail on a date with a guy she had been on a few dates with before. She was feeling and looking good. She had on a nice royal blue dress that came down to her mid thigh and was tight in all the right places along with some black ankle chunky heel booties with a zipper on the sides. She had tan skin, brown eyes and light dirty blonde hair color. She was a pretty girl with an athletic, toned body. She was meeting the guy, Blake, at the Velvet snail. Blake was a few inches taller than her at 6'2 (1017.5ft) although with her booties on she was almost the same height. He was well built and had brown hair.

Her and Blake had met up and talked for a bit sipping their drinks before they began dancing the night away, drinking and laughing while they did so. As they danced Caylie decided she wanted to take off her booties. As she sat at a booth and unzipped the booties and pulled her tan feet out, her toes well pedicured with pink nail polish which matched her manicured fingers,

"Sorry but my feet are killing me."

"Hey it's alright Caylie, I mean you're not the only barefoot girl I see." Blake joked.

"Yeah well if you step on my toes while I'm barefoot, you're going home alone mister." Caylie teased.

"Well what if I step on your toes with my toes?"

"Oh so you're going barefoot now too?" Caylie smirked as she stood up.

"Sure why not. We can go dance in the corner over there where there's no one dancing." Blake said pulling off his socks and shoes.

Caylie and Blake made their way over to the empty corner.

Michael and his friends and the girls were having so much fun. He was dancing with Daisy, a cure brunette when the floor started shaking more than normal.

"Uh guys." Tom said who was with Melissa.

They all turned to see two massive people coming towards them, a man and a woman, both barefoot approaching rapidly. The giant and giantess were upon them in no time and that's when it hit them.

To Caylie and Blake, their feet were far below them and the smell was far from their noses. To the six people at their feet, the smell of feet was overpowering.

The giant's feet were musty and vinegary underlying the sweaty smell and re giantess's feet were musky and cheesy underlying the sweaty smell. The foot funk of the giant couple was overpowering to the 6 and they began to cough and gag as the ground shook as the giant couple danced.

15421.content:
Caylie and Blake were dancing away, their feet slamming against the dance floor as they danced enjoying each other and themselves. It was a much different story for the tinies below who were dodging the massive stomping feet of the giant couple. No matter where the Michael and his friends ran, they couldn't escape the dance floor with the massive sweaty feet cutting them off. They were trapped.

The feet of the giantess and giant smelled sweaty and were a bit dirty on the soles from dancing barefoot. The giant's feet were larger and had a strong sour smell while the giantess's had a cheesy, musky smell. The giantess's feet were tan and her pedicured toes had a pink nail polish. As the colossal soles of the giantess and giant passed over heard, the tinies could see dirt mashed to the massive soles and the soles were reddened. Each time one of the feet of giant couple slammed down, the floor shook like an earthquake and Michael and friends would lose their balance.

Michael watched as Tom began to run, in almost slow motion, the giantess's massive tan foot lifted up and the massive dropped as the giantess moved her foot to the beat. The gargantuan foot landed squarely on Tom, the heel of the giantess now where Tom had once been running. Seeing this, a man may of them had just been talking to, being crushed beneath the sweaty, smelly foot of a dancing giantess, caused the girls to scream and Peter and Michael to stare in shock at what they had just witnessed.

"We have to get out of here! I'm not getting crushed by some giant bitch!" Peter screamed. "Oh my god! Oh my god! She killed him!" Melissa screamed. "Let's move!" Michael yelled as the giant couples feet rocked the dance floor as they slammed down. Melissa however, was rooted in place. She was screaming nonsense and crying. "Melissa! Run!" Elizabeth yelled. Melissa was suddenly cast in a shadow. She looked up and didn't even have time to scream as the massive sweaty foot of the giant crushed her into the floor.

"MELISSA!" Screamed Daisy. Elizabeth had now taken off running while Peter and Michael tried to pull Daisy back. She was in tears and couldn't even comprehend what ha just happened to her friend. The giant's godly foot twisted and lifted off, slamming down farther away. "Shit, where'd Elizabeth go?" Michael said. He turned and saw Elizabeth running for her life.

Elizabeth turned around and saw the foot of the giantess arcing overhead. "Oh my god! Please don't! I'm down her-" The stinky tan foot of the giantess slammed down on Elizabeth as the giantess was now stomping her feet to the new song that was playing. They saw the giantess was now dancing closer to the giant and his huge feet were now dangerously close to the group.

"We are gonna die!" Daisy cried. "No we're not!" Michael yelled. Daisy suddenly began to run away. Michael went to follow her but Peter grabbed his arm. "Forget her! She's crazy!" "Are you serious Pete? We can't just leave her."

"Yes we can." Peter said. The two men began to run the opposite direction. Daisy ran as fast as she could. She was close to the giant feet of the couple and could smell their sweaty foot funk as it wafted from their massive feet. The massive foot of the giantess slammed down it front of Daisy knocking her off her feet and blocking her path. She turned to run the opposite way but didn't get very far. Without warning, the smelly foot of the giant slammed down on her, smashing her without any resistance.

Michael and Peter were running as fast as they could, their legs pumping as they ran for the edge of the dance floor. It was still a bit away when suddenly the huge foot of the giant man slammed down in front of them with a loud slam. They were knocked off their feet and immediately smelled the sour sweaty scent of the giant's foot. They quickly stood back up and began to run around the foot. The giant shifted his foot which caused Michael to run one way and Peter to run the other.

Peter was running as quick as he could, his legs and lungs burning. He didn't think when he came to the Velvet Snail he'd end up running for his life while trying to dodge the feet of some giant dude and his giantess girl. Peter turned to look over at Michael who had run the opposite way. Peter saw Michael running and the giant's smelly foot and then turned his head a little further and saw the giant's other foot farther off. He looked around even more as he ran and noted he only saw one of the giantess's gargantuan tan feet. As he wondered where her other foot could be, he came to a horrible realization as he noticed the ground around get darker. He stopped in his tracks and looked up. Directly over him was a sky of reddened sweaty flesh, dirt and grime stuck to the colossal sole from the titaness dancing barefoot. Peter opened his mouth to scream as the last thing he saw was the sole of the giantess, just as the giantess's foot crushed him into nothing.

Michael continued running as fast as he could. He had no idea if Peter was still alive but as he saw the giantess slam her foot down in the area Peter had been running, he knew the answer. He snuck a look up at the giant couple. He couldn't make out their faces or much of their upper bodies but he could see the the toned tan legs of the giantess and the hairy legs of the giant going up to his shorts that came down to his knees. These people had just killed his friends and had no clue what they had done. They were just enjoying themselves.

info.brief_description: Adventures in a night club with giants and giantesses over 900ft tall.
info.description:
A story co-written with my girlfriend, Anna Philactik (real name). Comments and additions very welcome.

This story takes place in a world where giants 165 times bigger than a normal person exist alongside them. Mostly they live apart but in some cities they live together. New Olympus is such a town.

The Velvet Snail is the only night club which allows big and small people entry.
Women outnumber the men but there are a few there.

Shoe sizes are British (men's are the same; add 2.5 to get the US women's size)

Giants and little people coexist peacefully but anything can happen after a few drinks. Stay in character though.

As long as it's well written anything goes including sex and extreme violence except for:

No gay sex or men crushing men please (personal preference)
No Ugg boots allowed
keep stiletto heels to a minimum
